subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The rookie Toney Douglas had 14 points and 2 steals in the final six minutes, and led the Knicks’ comeback from a 9-point deficit against the 76ers.
snippet: The rookie Toney Douglas had 14 points and 2 steals in the final six minutes, and led the Knicks’ comeback from a 9-point deficit against the 76ers.
